films.title: Blade Runner
films.description: Sci-fi action drama about androids set in first half of 21. century.

films.title: Citizen Kane
films.description: The quasi-biographical film about American media baron Charles Foster Kane.

films.title: The Godfather
films.description: Dark drama about crime family Corleone set in the aftermath of II World War in New York City.

films.title: Seven Samurai
films.description: A village of desperate farmers hire seven rōnin to combat bandits who will return after the harvest to steal their cropstakes.

films.title: Casablanca
films.description: American must choose between his love for a woman or helping her husband, a Czech resistance leader.

films.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
films.description: Epic sci-fi drama of sdventure and exploration of space and origin of life on our planet.

films.title: The Piano
films.description: A period drama focuses on a mute Scottish woman who travels to New Zealand with her young daughter after her arranged marriage to a frontiersman.

films.title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
films.description: Controversial religious satire about life of Brian Cohen, born in a stable next door to the one in which Jesus is born.

films.title: Who's Singin' Over There?
films.description: A story about a group of passengers traveling by bus to Belgrade in 1941, during the last days of the Kingdom of Yugoslavia.

films.title: The House of the Spirits
films.description: Family saga about powerful Chilean family Trueba from 1926 till 1973.based on the novel by Isabel Allende.
